flavor.reason: The dishes, especially the yakitori skewers and specialty rolls, are flavorful, though some sushi items were inconsistent.

freshness.reason: While many items were fresh, there were occasional issues with fish quality and reheated appetizers.

service.reason: Service varied, with some attentive staff but also reports of slow service and billing issues.

environment.reason: The ambiance is lively and inviting, though the upstairs bar can be overcrowded and noisy.

value.reason: Daily specials offer good value, but regular prices and karaoke fees are considered high for the experience.
